text:
Rogelio "Roger" Moret Torres (September 16, 1949 – December 7, 2020) was a Puerto Rican professional baseball player. He played in Major League Baseball as a left-handed pitcher from 1970 to 1976 and in 1978 for the Boston Red Sox, Atlanta Braves and the Texas Rangers. He was born in Guayama, Puerto Rico.
Moret died on December 7, 2020 in Guayama from cancer at the age of 71.
